newsitem.title: USA: OPTIONS - US bond vols firm slightly before data.
newsitem.headline: OPTIONS - US bond vols firm slightly before data.

text.p: Implied volatilities for U.S. bond futures firmed slightly Wednesday afternoon as the market prepared for the release of important economic data at week's end.
June bond volatility was estimated at 8.68 percent late in the session, up slightly from 8.54 in the morning but roughly unchanged from Tuesday's close.
After hitting contract lows in May and June options Monday, volatility has been drifting upward, but has been restrained by a lack of price movement in the underlying futures, options analysts said.
